name: Gallade

passive.name: Counterattack
passive.effect: When Gallade takes damage from any attack, deal 20 damage to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.effect: Deal 30 more damage for each Prize Card you have more than your opponent.

flavor: It uses its psychic passive to focus its punches. Many trainers are surprised by this departure from the evolutionary line.
